title: AI Judgment Trail (AJT) v0.1
description: Minimal structured log schema capturing decision outcomes and accountability signals at system boundaries, without recording internal reasoning, decision trees, or step-by-step evaluation.

timestamp.description: ISO-8601 UTC timestamp of when the decision was made

run_id.description: Unique identifier for this specific AI execution

model.description: Identifier of the AI model involved in the execution (not the owner of judgment).

decision.description: Decision outcome at the system boundary, including intentional STOP states (e.g., 'allow', 'block', 'escalate').

risk_level.description: Declared risk level associated with the decision outcome; this field does not represent the internal risk evaluation process.

human_in_loop.description: Whether a human reviewed or approved this decision

policy_version.description: Version identifier of the decision policy applied

app_version.description: Version of the application making the AI call

session_id.description: User or request session identifier (anonymized if needed for privacy)
